page.title: 15LAW AND ORDER-VILLAGE POLICE
page.content: {OUR VILLAGE POLICE. } P.C.Mace,our Schools Liaison Officer,polices Lumley Bournmoor and Fencehouses with six officers attached to Chester-le-Street Division. Trained in S.Wales,he learnt fitness, self-defence, attack and the Law. He is also firearms trained. The main police problems in Lumley are occasional theft and vandalism and minor traffic offences.Police dogs are brought in if needed and there is one A-Reg.Ford Fiesta, due for replacement after 30 000 miles.{J.Boyne.S.Stabler. {MOUNTED POLICE SCHOOL VISIT. } When police horses Eddy and Monty visit a school,they think of mint sweets! They work three hours a day,walking fifteen miles. Trained for crowd control, they are taught to walk sideways, backwards and forwards.We got into two lines and shouted to put the horses off,but they just kept going!{C.McKitten,J.Thompson
